query: SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'subscriptions' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bdzn41uM6mMWcv.97707ddd6929 --database 3gcYftfyZmb2335Uoynmho --execute SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'subscriptions' ORDER BY ordinal_position;
